en.bdb: Then Krishna, in his fury, took out his Daityastra (the arm meant for the demons) and discharged it after reciting mantras over this wonderful arrow.1462.

verse.gurmukhi: kys bfy isir bys bury Aru dyh mY rom bfy ijn ky ]

bdb.gurmukhi: (ijnRhw dy) isrw auqy bhuq vwl hn, mwVy Bys hn Aqy dyh auqy v`fy v`fy rom hn।
